Hello everyone, here's a new batch of scopes.
First sight: bronya zaychik_(honkai impact), (lysh)
Second sight: shining_(arknights), kanta077
Third sight: blaze_(arknights), kanta077
And again, I hope you enjoy it.

Update 2-14-25: Reformatted to use BiCubic MipMaps without error/gamma correction. This will provide superior clarity, especially on lower resolutions.

Gun and HVAR rocket sight for the SB2C Helldiver series. Gun is accurate to 1000m, and rockets are sighted for both 600m and 300m. DIVE ANGLE IS STEEP for this sight. Come in at 40-70 degrees when aiming rockets for 600m, when aiming at 300m you can be more shallow. IAS should b...
